                " are (percentage) waypoints along the gradient line. At each color stop waypoint, the gradient is fully (==opaquely) colored with it’s assigned color. Interim points along the gradient line between color stops are colored as gradients of the this and the previous color."

      "8d994a83-3e81-4701-8e25-1f6bdf43d584": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949701279,
          "id": "8d994a83-3e81-4701-8e25-1f6bdf43d584",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594620060000,
          "parent_id": "ffddf567-40a6-4078-bbb0-5a097b6cf4e8",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["HTML"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "<!doctype html>\n<html>\n<head>\n<style>\n    body{ background-color:white; }\n    #canvas{border:1px solid red; }\n</style>\n<script>\nwindow.onload=(function(){\n\n    // canvas related variables\n    var canvas=document.getElementById(\"canvas\");\n    var ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\n\n    // Create a linearGradient\n    // Note: Nothing visually appears during this process\n    var gradient=ctx.createLinearGradient(100,0,canvas.width-100,0);\n    gradient.addColorStop(0,'red');\n    gradient.addColorStop(1,'magenta');\n\n    // Create a polyline path \n    // Note: Nothing visually appears during this process\n    var x=20;\n    var y=40;\n    ctx.lineCap='round';\n    ctx.lineJoin='round';\n    ctx.lineWidth=15;\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(x,y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+30,y+50);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+60,y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+90,y+50);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+120,y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+150,y+50);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+180,y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+210,y+50);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+240,y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+270,y+50);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+300,y);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+330,y+50);\n    ctx.lineTo(x+360,y);\n\n    // Set the stroke style to be the gradient\n    // Note: Nothing visually appears during this process\n    ctx.strokeStyle=gradient;\n    \n    // stroke the path\n    // FINALLY! The gradient-stroked path is visible on the canvas\n    ctx.stroke();\n\n}); // end window.onload\n</script>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <canvas id=\"canvas\" width=400 height=150></canvas>\n</body>\n</html>"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 3
        }
      },
